description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on January 13, 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Imaging and Receiver General of Canada (IRGOD) in Matane, Quebec, Canada is issuing this request for standing offer (RFSO) to get document printing services as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### EN929-230111: Industrial Printing Services
#### Synopsis

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) hereby announces a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) to acquire industrial printing services for the Imagining and Receiver General of Canada (IRGOD) in Matane, Quebec. The bidders must submit all required documentation and bids by 2 PM EST on January 13, 2023. The document specifications are outlined in Annex A.

### Key Details
#### Contracting Entity
* Contracting Entity Name: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* Address: 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Annie Deslauriers (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: annie.deslauriers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Contract Specifications
* Solicitation Number: WS3788625100
* Amendment Number: 2
* Public Publication Date: December 15, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: January 13, 2023 (14:00 HNE)
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: January 31, 2026

#### Additional Information
* Procurement Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Bidding Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Corresponding Regions: Matane, Quebec
* Transporting Regions: None

#### Original Announcement

Please refer to the official announcement on Ariba Discovery ([hyperlink]http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14907522?extsite=MTQ5MDc1MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==[/hyperlink]) for full details.

### Closing Note

The PSPC in close collaboration with IRGOD expects to start delivering services in the industrial printing domain within the soonest possible time. The Department looks forward to receiving meaningful proposals from reputable contracting firms capable of meeting their immediate needs.

[Insert terms and conditions, remedial actions, bid evaluation criteria etc as annex]([annexlink])
